QueryResult.text: SELECT DISTINCT OA.RECORD_ID INVESTMENT_ID, UF.BRANCH_UNIT_ID OBS_UNIT, OA.TABLE_NAME FROM PRJ_OBS_ASSOCIATIONS OA, PRJ_OBS_UNITS_FLAT UF WHERE OA.UNIT_ID = UF.UNIT_ID AND OA.TABLE_NAME IN ( SELECT O.OBS_CODE FROM ODF_OBJECTS O, ODF_OBJECT_EXTENSIONS EXT WHERE O.CODE= EXT.OBJECT_CODE AND EXT.EXTENSION_CODE='inv' AND O.IS_OBS_ENABLED=1 )
